summary: For all of you who like the black metal corpsepaint!
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Black Metal Corpse Paint 1.1

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For all of you who like the black metal corpsepaint!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
This mod adds 12 new Corpsepaints, for male and female,
to the following races:
Breton
Dark Elf
High Elf
Imperial
Nord
Redguard
Wood Elf

Usage:
for the corpsepaint use the dirt slider
and for the white head background use the last face paint
with these two steps you will get the perfect BM look!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
As usual drop all the files into your ...\\Skyrim\\Data ordner.

Deinstallation:
Delete the installed files from your ...\\Skyrim\\Data ordner.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Versions:
V1.0 - Added 12, m&f, facepaints without white
V1.1 - put the facepaints in the dirt slider and added the white background
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended mods:
for females use the Better Females by Bella
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: 19dlb92
